wmndsTravelModePageBannerProps.name: title
wmndsTravelModePageBannerProps.description: Required. Title content to use in the banner.

wmndsTravelModePageBannerProps.name: contentHTML
wmndsTravelModePageBannerProps.description: Required. HTML content to use in the banner.

wmndsTravelModePageBannerProps.name: image
wmndsTravelModePageBannerProps.description: Required. Url for the image to be displayed in the banner.

wmndsTravelModePageBannerProps.name: mode
wmndsTravelModePageBannerProps.description: Transport mode the banner relates to. This will determine the icon and background colour which is displayed. Accepted values are bus, rail, metro, roads, walk and cycle. If not set, will default to bus.
